product_name: Ortovox Tour 32 + 7 ABS Avalanche Airbag Pack
long_description: With a light and low-profile airbag inflation system, the Ortovox Tour 32 + 7 ABS Avalanche Airbag pack serves up protection for ski enthusiasts and professionals venturing into the backcountry.
short_description: With a light and low-profile airbag inflation system, the Ortovox Tour 32 + 7 ABS Avalanche Airbag pack serves up protection for ski enthusiasts and professionals venturing into the backcountry.
